jlmsplugin.name: Course Join Notify Plugin
jlmsplugin.author: JoomlaLMS Team
jlmsplugin.description: Plugin notifies users about joining a course when they was added to the course attendeees list. (i.e. after enrolling into the course or after joining the course from Waiting List)
jlmsplugin.short_description: Course joining notification plugin for 'Waiting lists'

param.name: mail_template
param.label: Mail template
param.description: Hello {user_name}, You have just been added to the course {course_name} attendees list.
